name: Quinoa Fajita Burritos
description: Boost your busy day with a fibre- and protein-packed lunch solution. It’s healthy, satisfying, and brimming with yummy quinoa and veg. Here’s a pro tip: assemble your burrito in the morning before you dash out. This guarantees a fresh and delicious meal, with no risk of a soggy tortilla, making it the perfect on-the-go lunch.
preparation: In Round or Multipurpose Steamer, stir risotto mix with hot water. Cover; microwave on high 9 min. Stir in lentils and seasoning. Cover; microwave on high 8 min.
Meanwhile, thinly slice peppers and onion.
Remove steamer from microwave; stir in butter. Cover; let stand 3 min, or until excess liquid is absorbed.
Spread 2 tbsp yogurt over each tortilla. Divide risotto mixture on top. Add peppers, onion, cheese, and additional toppings, if desired. Fold in bottom edge of each tortilla, then sides; roll up.

products.name: Tuscan Herb Risotto Mix (Pack of 3)
summary: Everyone has one dish that they find daunting to make, and for many, that’s risotto. It’s easy to overcook or undercook it and end up with a disaster on your plate – until now. Master your Italian cooking skills by cooking rich and creamy risotto in the microwave – no pot to watch or constant stirring here! – in less than 20 minutes! Perfect for a date night at home or anytime you want to level up a weeknight dinner.

products.name: Fajita Seasoning
summary: A lively, mild blend for seasoning beef, chicken, or fish fajitas & enchiladas.

products.name: Taco Seasoning (Jar)
summary: Classic Tex-Mex flavor with medium heat.

products.name: Round Steamer
summary: A must-have tool for every kitchen! Our game-changing silicone Round Steamer cooks food faster and more evenly in the microwave. Bring a whole, juicy Roast Chicken to the table in 20 minutes, perfectly cook fluffy grains, baked potatoes, and tender veggies, or meal prep soups and chowders for easy weeknight meals. The possibilities are endless!

products.name: Multipurpose Steamer
summary: Like a casserole dish in design & purpose, this cooking utensil is made of silicone & has a 14-cup capacity.
